docs.text: the dream team is a thoroughly entertaining comedy featuring four loveable characters who just happen to be slightly insane .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: billy , played by michael keaton , is an extremely temperamental mental ward patient whose short fuse and violent tantrums tend to get him in trouble .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: christopher lloyd portrays henry , an obsessive-compulsive who requires that everything be neat , orderly , on schedule , and by the books .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he thinks he's a doctor so he walks around wearing a suit and carrying a clipboard on which he constantly scribbles notes and files reports .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: jack , played by peter boyle , thinks he's jesus .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and finally , there's stephen furst as albert , a chubby catatonic who speaks only in baseball and television phrases .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the dream team follows the misadventures that beset the four-some when their psychiatrist , dr . weitzman , takes them out of the hospital for a field trip to yankee stadium .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: during a pit stop , they get separated from weitzman and are left to fend for themselves in manhattan .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the movie's charm derives mostly from the camaraderie and chemistry between its delightful cast .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the four leads in the film play off each other quite effectively ; they never miss an opportunity to argue , bicker , or insult one another .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: henry and jack , for example , fight over who's going to get to ride in the front passenger seat on the way to the game .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the actors in the dream team have a lot of fun with their characters and with each other .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: michael keaton is well cast as billy ; he gives his cynical character considerable complexity .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as the divinely jack , peter boyle succeeds in keeping his one-dimensional character funny and fresh .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: although stephen furst's catatonic character is cliched , the actor makes him sympathetic and endearing .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: while keaton , boyle , and furst are good , it's christopher lloyd who really makes the movie special .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: lloyd gives yet another outstanding comic performance .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: his body language ( for example , the way he walks ) and his facial expressions are perfectly suited to his compulsive character .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: lloyd's brilliant performance yields a pathetic , moving , and memorable character .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the dream team is a solid comedy with more depth and drama than you might expect from its simple premise .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the characters are so appealing that you can excuse the film for its often outlandish and unbelievable plot .
docs.label: positive
